alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Eastern Union; Western Bergen; Western Essex; Western Union (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 6:08PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Passaic, northwestern Union, central Bergen and Essex Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 607 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Wayne to near Madison. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paterson, Passaic, Wayne, Bloomfield, Hackensack, Orange, Bergenfield, Paramus, Ridgewood, Summit, Lyndhurst, Millburn, Rutherford, Caldwell and Hawthorne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Eastern Union; Western Bergen; Western Essex; Western Union
